about_the_game:
This pack includes:

  • Valentine 'Viper' Chase hero unlock;
  • Biker Queen suit;
  • Black glasses;
  • 700 Crowns.

Valentine Chase is a daughter of the founder of the "Apostles of Hell" motorcycle club, famous in the southern states not only for disobeying the rules of the AMA, but also for breaking federal laws. Thanks to her unusual abilities, she can get out of any scrape whole and unhurt.

Ability: “Flickering Step”
The ability allows you to enter Flickering Step mode for 18 seconds. Flickering Step allows you to make a series of instant 20 meter dashes in the direction you're facing (if there isn't any obstacles in the way). You cannot dash more than 3 times as each dash reduces the remaining duration by 6 seconds.

Golden Crowns is an in-game currency that can be spent on:

  • Battle Pass which allows you to pass additional challenges and get unique rewards;
  • Unique outfits and gestures in the in-game store;
  • Exchange to Eternal Grace, which is the main currency accepted in the shadow realm, required for obtaining new mystic powers.

Note!

  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same content!
  • Available only for Windows. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account, or the mobile version.
detailed_description:
This pack includes:

  • Valentine 'Viper' Chase hero unlock;
  • Biker Queen suit;
  • Black glasses;
  • 700 Crowns.

Valentine Chase is a daughter of the founder of the "Apostles of Hell" motorcycle club, famous in the southern states not only for disobeying the rules of the AMA, but also for breaking federal laws. Thanks to her unusual abilities, she can get out of any scrape whole and unhurt.

Ability: “Flickering Step”
The ability allows you to enter Flickering Step mode for 18 seconds. Flickering Step allows you to make a series of instant 20 meter dashes in the direction you're facing (if there isn't any obstacles in the way). You cannot dash more than 3 times as each dash reduces the remaining duration by 6 seconds.

Golden Crowns is an in-game currency that can be spent on:

  • Battle Pass which allows you to pass additional challenges and get unique rewards;
  • Unique outfits and gestures in the in-game store;
  • Exchange to Eternal Grace, which is the main currency accepted in the shadow realm, required for obtaining new mystic powers.

Note!

  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same content!
  • Available only for Windows. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account, or the mobile version.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit /8 64bit /10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 560 or better, AMD Radeon 77XX or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please note, that for Nvidia GPUs second digit matters a lot, so 640 or 730 are much slower than 560!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit /8 64bit /10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 560 or better, AMD Radeon 77XX or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please note, that for Nvidia GPUs second digit matters a lot, so 640 or 730 are much slower than 560!
